value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore non-relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying non-relational databases, and non-relational data stores with Microsoft Azure.

value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to recommend and design system feedback mechanisms, implement a process for routing system feedback to development teams, and optimize feedback mechanisms.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will be provided with a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI. You will be able to describe what AI happens to be and the technologies that underpin it. You will be able to share  how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Manage cloud resources
value.excerpt:
Learn more about how the cloud works by exploring it's underlying technology of virtualization, how to take advantage of the cloud for scale, and how to automate cloud resource management.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about virtualization and how it's used in the cloud
Know what VMs and containers are
Understand what scale, load, and common load patterns are
Know what autoscaling is and be familiar with autoscaling techniques
Learn how to automate cloud resource management with scripts
Understand the concept of infrastructure-as-code

In Partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

topItems.title: Automate cloud resource management
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

value.title: Plan and implement data platform resources
value.excerpt: Deploy data platform resources in Azure for SQL Server and Open Source databases. Explore options for upgrade and migration.  Calculate resource requirements and create templates.

topItems.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

topItems.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in healthcare
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in healthcare that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Every modern business is powered by applications, such as internal procurement applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, retail websites, and third-party products. As your business prepares for digital transformation, it’s important to begin modernizing and migrating your applications and infrastructure to the cloud. Azure is a key component of that process. You can choose to migrate, modernize, or build cloud native solutions depending on your business goals and how you assess your application portfolio. This is a strategic decision. You’ll be able to choose the path that’s right for your organization.

value.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources
value.excerpt: Securely authenticate apps to Azure to manage and access Azure services. Service principals and managed identities give your app an Azure AD identity.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build a web API with Node.js and Express
value.excerpt: Use Express for Node.js to build RESTful APIs. Create and configure middleware to add things like logging and authentication/authorization.

value.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

value.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Set up continuous data export from Azure IoT Central to a Power BI app
value.excerpt: This module covers continuous data export from IoT Central. You use the scenario from your previously completed "Create your first Azure IoT Central app" Learn module, where you controlled a refrigerated truck. Here, in this module, you add continuous data export to both Azure Blob storage and an event hub. You then build a Power BI app to read and display the telemetry data on a mobile phone.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Learn how to create and deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL for fully managed, enterprise-ready PostgreSQL database services.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

value.title: Creating and configuring a HDInsight cluster
value.excerpt: Creating and configuring a HDInsight Cluster

value.title: Microsoft data estate migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Establishing a modern data estate is a foundational step toward digital transformation. A modern data estate enables timely insights and decision making across all your data, and sets the foundation for AI. A data estate is all of the data an organization owns. When you migrate this data to the cloud or modernize your environment on-premises you can gain important insights to fuel innovation.

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data

value.title: Automate Azure Functions deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Azure Functions.

value.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.
